413960.name: Robotpencil Presents: Dynamic Lighting
413960.description:
Part 1
-Roughing in Light shapes
-Use of Texture Brushes
-The sense of Scale and Detail

Part 2
Covers the importance of understanding light at a basic level, and how you can get a lot out of one light source. I'll touch upon why people make mistakes with their lighting when they overcomplicate it, and show you some habits/techniques you should embrace moving forward.

Part 3
-Type of brushes you should make to help block in.
-Limited value range to get started.
-How to finish and get it ready to present to a client.

Included

-HiRes JPG/PSD
-Brushes for Photoshop CC 2014
